name: GO GO Gamebert! 2
description:
"Play" as Gamebert and deliver food to unthankful customers while being exploited by your supervisor. Not fun at all! This game is definitely not autobiographical! Keep politics out of our games!

WASD to control Gamebert.
Use the roads to travel around faster!
Deliver food on time to the people that ordered it. Keep an eye on your minimap and your rating! If you deliver on time, you will surely receive tips and good ratings, right?

Assets used:


https://www.kenney.nl/assets/rpg-urban-pack
